revision.comment: +''Note. When used in main space, the word "page" in the following hat notes is replaced by "article".''
revision.text: {{template doc page transcluded}}{{template doc page viewed directly}} {{tl|otheruses4}} is a commonly used [[Wikipedia:Hatnote|hatnote]] on Wikipedia, and so should be placed at the top of an article, linking the reader to articles with similar titles or concepts that they may have been seeking instead. For quicker and more intuitive use, {{'''about'''}} redirects here, and so can be used interchangeably with {{otheruses4}}. For reference, there is information about [[Wikipedia:Hatnote|hatnotes in general]], [[Wikipedia:Hatnote#Examples of proper use|when and how to use them]], a complete [[Wikipedia:Hatnote#Templates|list of the other hatnotes]] available, and [[Wikipedia:Otheruses templates (example usage)|examples of their use]]. For further information, see the [[Template talk:Otheruses4|talk page]]. ==Usage== ''Note. When used in main space, the word "page" in the following hat notes is replaced by "article".'' * {{otheruses4|USE1}} : {{otheruses4|USE1|other uses|PAGE NAME (disambiguation)}} * {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2}} : {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE NAME (disambiguation)}} * {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE2}} : {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE2}} * {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE2|USE3|PAGE3|USE4|PAGE4|USE5|PAGE5}} : {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE2|USE3|PAGE3|USE4|PAGE4|USE5|PAGE5}} When there as many other uses as in the last example, it would be more appropriate to create a [[Wikipedia:Disambiguation|disambiguation page]]. Like all templates, it works with or without an initial capital letter; in addition, the word 'otheruses4' can be also replaced by 'about'. For example: * {{about|USE1}} : {{about|USE1|other uses|PAGE NAME (disambiguation)}} {{Otheruses templates}} [[Category:Template documentation|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[Category:Disambiguation and redirection templates|{{PAGENAME}}]] [[fr:Autre4]] [[lv:Veidne:Otheruses4]] [[mk:Шаблон:Другизначења4]] [[sl:Predloga:Drugipomeni4]] [[vi:Tiêu bản:Otheruses4]] [[zh-yue:Template:Otheruses4]] [[sv:Mall:Hänvisning]]

{{dablink|{{#if: {{{1|}}}|This article is about {{{1}}}. |}}For {{#if: {{{2|}}}|{{{2}}}|other uses}}, see [[{{#if: {{{3|}}}|{{{3}}}|{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)}}]] and [[{{#if: {{{4|}}}|{{{4}}}|{{PAGENAME}}s (disambiguation)}}]].}}<noinclude>[[Category:Disambiguation and redirection templates|{{PAGENAME}}]]</noinclude>

<noinclude>{{pp-template|small=yes}}</noinclude> {{dablink|For other uses, see [[{{{1|{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)}}}]] and [[{{{2|{{PAGENAME}} (disambiguation)}}}]].}}<noinclude>
---- For further information, see talk page. [[Category:Disambiguation and redirection templates|{{PAGENAME}}]] <!--Other languages--> </noinclude>

{| class="messagebox" style="width:80%; border:1px solid #c0c090; background:#f8eaba; margin:2px 4px 2px 4px;" |- style="vertical-align:top;" |align="center" style="width:60px; padding:1ex;"| [[Image:Edit-paste.svg|none|40px]] | '''This is the template documentation box for all of the Otheruses templates.'''
Such templates are not necessarily intended to be viewed directly. If they use [[w:Help:Variable|variable]]s, some links may appear broken. Do not replace these variables with [[w:Hard coding|hardcoded]] page names or URLs. |}
{{tnavbar|otheruses templates}}
== Otheruses templates == To discuss these templates as a whole, please see [[Wikipedia talk:Disambiguation]] If you wish to discuss general wordings, rather than the wording or formatting of this specific template, don't post here, or else what you say will probably go unnoticed. For a summary page on how to use these templates, see [[Wikipedia:Otheruses templates (example usage)]]. === Generic === * {{[[Template:Dablink|Dablink]]|TEXT}}: {{dablink|TEXT}} ::For example, {{dablink|For other senses of this term, see [[etc...]]}}. This template is adaptable, but fails to standardize [[Wikipedia:hatnotes|hatnotes]]. *{{[[Template:Selfref|Selfref]]|TEXT}}: {{Selfref|TEXT}} ::(Similar to [[Template:Dablink|Dablink]], but used for messages that wouldn't make sense on mirrors of Wikipedia, such as a link in the main article namespace that links to one in the Wikipedia namespace. ''See [[Wikipedia:Avoid self-references]] for more details''.) === Otheruses === ''Note. When used in main space, the word "page" in the following hat notes is replaced by "article".'' {{tl|About}} is the main template for giving other uses; it redirects to {{tl|otheruses4}}. * {{[[Template:Otheruses4|otheruses4]]|USE1}} (disambiguous): {{otheruses4|USE1}} * {{[[Template:Otheruses4|otheruses4]]|USE1|USE2}}: {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2}} * {{[[Template:Otheruses4|otheruses4]]|USE1|USE2|PAGE2}}: {{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE2}} * {{[[Template:About|About]]||USE2|PAGE2|USE3|PAGE3|USE4|PAGE4|USE5|PAGE5}} (alias and empty first param): :{{About||USE2|PAGE2|USE3|PAGE3|USE4|PAGE4|USE5|PAGE5}} * {{[[Template:otheruses4|otheruses4]]|USE1|USE2|PAGE2|USE3|PAGE3|USE4|PAGE4|USE5|PAGE5}} (fully specified): :{{otheruses4|USE1|USE2|PAGE2|USE3|PAGE3|USE4|PAGE4|USE5|PAGE5}} ====Variations==== There are also variations of {{tl|about}}. These serve the same purpose, and are marginally easier to use for each individual purpose, but overall, it is complicated to have so many different templates; it could be argued that the time saved using them is lost as other editors have to familiarise themselves with them. All of these templates are special cases of {{tl|about}}. * {{[[Template:Otheruses|otheruses]]}}: {{otheruses}} Note: {{tlx|about}} will produce the same result. * {{[[Template:Otheruses1|otheruses1]]|USE}}: {{otheruses1|USE}} Note: {{tlx|about|USE}} will produce the same result. * {{[[Template:Otheruses2|otheruses2]]|PAGE}}: {{otheruses2|PAGE}} Note: this simply adds "(disambiguation)" to what you input as PAGE. * {{[[Template:Otheruses3|otheruses3]]|PAGE}}: {{otheruses3|PAGE}} Note: {{tlx|about|{{!}}{{!}}PAGE}} will produce the same result - note the two empty parameters. * {{[[Template:Otheruses5|otheruses5]]}}: {{otheruses5}} Note: this is for when there is both a singular and plural disambiguation page; it only works when the plural is formed simply by adding "s" at the end. * {{[[Template:Otheruses6|otheruses6]]|PAGE1|PAGE2}}: {{otheruses6|PAGE1|PAGE2}} Note: this is for when there are two disambiguation pages, such as noun and adjective, or singular and irregular plural. There are only two parameters and at least one is required.
Note: this cannot be recreated with {{tlx|about}} - only with {{tlx|dablink}} or {{tlx|for}}. * {{[[Template:This|This]]|USE|PAGE}}: {{this|USE|PAGE}} Note: {{tlx|about|USE|{{!}}PAGE}} will produce the same result - note the empty parameter. * {{[[Template:Otheruses-section]]}}: {{Otheruses-section}} Note: This template is precisely the same as {{tl|Otheruses4}}, except it says "section" instead of "article" or "page", and indents only as far as {{tl|Main}} and other section quasi-hatnotes. ===== For (other topic) ===== {{tl|for}} (and {{tl|for2}}) can be used instead of {{tl|about}} to not include the first part - "This article is about USE". However, this can also simply be achieved with an empty first parameter in {{tl|about}}.
For example, {{[[Template:For|For]]|OTHER TOPIC|PAGE}} becomes {{[[Template:About|About]]||OTHER TOPIC|PAGE}}.
{{tl|for3}} is somewhat different, appending the word ''the'' in its mention of the second parameter, then generates a link using either the second or (if present) the third parameter as a parenthetical. {{tl|the}} is simply a rendering of {{tl|for3}} without bothering with the optional first argument. * {{[[Template:For|For]]}} (disambiguous): {{for}} * {{[[Template:For|For]]|OTHER TOPIC}} (disambiguous): {{for|OTHER TOPIC}} * {{[[Template:For|For]]|OTHER TOPIC|PAGE}}: {{for|OTHER TOPIC|PAGE}} * {{[[Template:For|For]]|OTHER TOPIC|PAGE1|PAGE2}}: {{for|OTHER TOPIC|PAGE1|PAGE2}} * {{[[Template:For2|For2]]|OTHER TOPIC|CUSTOM TEXT}}: {{for2|OTHER TOPIC|CUSTOM TEXT}} * {{[[Template:For3|For3]]||DIFFERENT MEANING|}}: {{for3||DIFFERENT MEANING}} * {{[[Template:For3|For3]]|OTHER TOPIC|DIFFERENT MEANING}}: {{for3|OTHER TOPIC|DIFFERENT MEANING}} * {{[[Template:For3|For3]]|OTHER TOPIC|DIFFERENT MEANING|CUSTOM PARENTHETICAL}}: {{for3|OTHER TOPIC|DIFFERENT MEANING|CUSTOM PARENTHETICAL}} * {{[[Template:The|The]]|DIFFERENT MEANING}}: {{the|DIFFERENT MEANING}} * {{[[Template:The|The]]|DIFFERENT MEANING|CUSTOM PARENTHETICAL}}: {{the|DIFFERENT MEANING|CUSTOM PARENTHETICAL}} ===== See also ===== * {{[[Template:See also|See also]]|OTHER TOPIC}}: {{See also|OTHER TOPIC}} This can be used when OTHER TOPIC is related to that of the current article, and already contains a self-explanatory parenthetical. ==== Other people ==== * {{[[Template:Otherpersons|otherpersons]]}} (disambiguous): {{Otherpersons}} * {{[[Template:Otherpersons|otherpersons]]|USE}} (disambiguous): {{Otherpersons|USE}} * {{[[Template:Otherpersons|otherpersons]]|USE|PAGE}}: {{Otherpersons|USE|PAGE}} * {{[[Template:Otherpeople2|otherpeople2]]|PAGE}}: {{Otherpeople2|PAGE}} * {{[[Template:Otherpeople3|otherpeople3]]|USE1|USE2}}: {{Otherpeople3|USE1|USE2}} * {{[[Template:Otherpeople4|otherpeople4]]|USE1|USE2|PAGE}}: {{Otherpeople4|USE1|USE2|PAGE}} ==== Other places ==== *{{tl|Otherplaces}}, analogous to {{tl|Otheruses}} {{Otherplaces}} *{{tl|Otherplaces2}}, analogous to {{tl|Otheruses2}} {{Otherplaces2|DifferentArticleName}} *{{tl|Otherplaces3}}, analogous to {{tl|Otheruses3}} {{Otherplaces3|DifferentArticleName}} ==== Otherhurricaneuses ==== : For articles on [[storm]]s. * {{[[Template:Otherhurricaneuses|otherhurricaneuses]]}} (disambiguous): {{Otherhurricaneuses}} * {{[[Template:Otherhurricaneuses|otherhurricaneuses]]|DISAMBIG}}: {{Otherhurricaneuses|DISAMBIG}} * {{[[Template:Otherhurricaneuses|otherhurricaneuses]]|DISAMBIG|THIS}}: {{Otherhurricaneuses|DISAMBIG|THIS}} * {{[[Template:Otherhurricaneuses3|otherhurricaneuses3]]|USE1|USE2|MAIN}}: {{Otherhurricaneuses3|USE1|USE2|MAIN}} ==== Otherusesof (topic) ==== * {{[[Template:Otherusesof|otherusesof]]}} (disambiguous): {{otherusesof}} * {{[[Template:Otherusesof|otherusesof]]|TOPIC}}: {{otherusesof|TOPIC}} * {{[[Template:Otherusesof|otherusesof]]|TOPIC|PAGE}}: {{otherusesof|TOPIC|PAGE}} === Redirect === * {{[[Template:Redirect|Redirect]]|REDIRECT}} (disambiguous): {{Redirect|REDIRECT}} * {{[[Template:Redirect|Redirect]]|REDIRECT||PAGE}}: {{Redirect|REDIRECT||PAGE}} * {{[[Template:Redirect|Redirect]]|REDIRECT|USE|PAGE}}: {{Redirect|REDIRECT|USE|PAGE}} * {{[[Template:Redirect2|Redirect2]]|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2}} (disambiguous): {{Redirect2|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2}} * {{[[Template:Redirect2|Redirect2]]|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2|USE|PAGE}}: {{Redirect2|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2|USE|PAGE}} * {{[[Template:Redirect3|Redirect3]]|REDIRECT|TEXT}}: {{Redirect3|REDIRECT|TEXT}} * {{[[Template:Redirect4|Redirect4]]|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2}} (disambiguous): {{Redirect4|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2}} * {{[[Template:Redirect5|Redirect5]]|REDIRECT|USE1|PAGE1|USE2|PAGE2}}: {{Redirect5|REDIRECT|USE1|PAGE1|USE2|PAGE2}} * {{[[Template:Redirect5|Redirect5]]|REDIRECT|USE1|PAGE1||PAGE2}}: {{Redirect5|REDIRECT|USE1|PAGE1||PAGE2}} * {{[[Template:Redirect6|Redirect6]]|REDIRECT|USE1|PAGE1||}}: {{Redirect6|REDIRECT|USE1|PAGE1||}} * {{[[Template:Redirect8|Redirect8]]|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2}}: {{Redirect8|REDIRECT1|REDIRECT2}} === "Not to be confused with"... === * {{[[Template:Distinguish|Distinguish]]|PAGE}}: {{Distinguish|PAGE}} * {{[[Template:Distinguish2|Distinguish2]]|TEXT}}: {{Distinguish2|TEXT}} === Notes === '''Do not use [[Wikipedia:Template substitution|subst:]] with these templates''', as that will prevent: #propagating changes as the template is modified; and #the ''[[Special:Whatlinkshere/{{NAMESPACE}}:{{PAGENAME}}|What links here]]'' (WLH) listing. '''Please do not edit these templates unless you know what you are doing''' These templates may be used in thousands of articles, and changing the syntax could therefore break thousands of articles. If you wish to edit a disambiguation template first ask yourself: # Is there already another template that will do this job? We have lots of disambiguation templates already, see [[:Category:Disambiguation and redirection templates]]. # Do I really need a template for this? Will it ever get used on any other articles, or should I just use {{tl|dablink}} instead? # Do I know what will happen if I change the parameters around? Will it break existing uses of the template, and if so, can I fix them all?
(This box appears in [[Special:Whatlinkshere/Template:Otheruses templates|several articles in Template talk and Wikipedia namespaces]].)
{{Documentation}}
